code:
@allure.feature("首页模块")
    @allure.story("日程管理操作")
    @allure.title("测试进入日程管理并点击创建按钮")
    @allure.severity(allure.severity_level.NORMAL)
    def test_demo(self):
        # 定义minium截图默认输出根目录（固定规则：test目录下的outputs）
        self.minium_screenshot_root = "./outputs"

        try:
            with allure.step("初始化发现页操作类"):
                hom_page = HomePage(self)
                allure.attach("成功初始化HomePage操作类", name="操作结果", attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.TEXT)

            with allure.step("跳转到首页"):
                hom_page.goto_home_page()
                allure.attach("成功跳转到首页", name="操作结果", attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.TEXT)

            with allure.step("点击左上角个人中心头像"):
                user_btn = self.page.get_element(home_user_element, max_timeout=max_timeout)
                user_btn.click()
                allure.attach(f"成功点击个人中心头像，元素选择器：{home_user_element}", name="操作结果",
                              attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.TEXT)

            with allure.step(f"查找并点击[{home_user_schedule_btn_name}]按钮"):
                user_btn_list = self.page.get_elements(home_user_schedule_btn_element, max_timeout=max_timeout)
                for user_btn in user_btn_list:
                    if user_btn.text == home_user_schedule_btn_name:
                        user_btn.click()
                        allure.attach(f"找到文本为[{home_user_schedule_btn_name}]的按钮并点击", name="操作结果",
                                      attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.TEXT)
                        break
                else:
                    allure.attach(f"未找到文本为[{home_user_schedule_btn_name}]的按钮", name="操作结果",
                                  attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.TEXT)

            with allure.step("截取日程管理页面截图"):
                timestamp = time.strftime("%H%M%S")
                # 1. 只传文件名（不带路径、不带.png后缀），让minium自动处理
                screenshot_name = f"日程管理后_{timestamp}"
                self.capture(screenshot_name, region=self.page)  # 核心：只传纯文件名
                time.sleep(1)

                # 2. 查找minium实际生成的截图文件（适配minium的路径规则）
                actual_screenshot_path = self._find_minium_screenshot(screenshot_name)

                # 3. 附加到allure（找到则附加，找不到则记录日志）
                if actual_screenshot_path:
                    allure.attach.file(actual_screenshot_path, name="日程管理页面截图",
                                       attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.PNG)
                    allure.attach(f"成功截取截图：{actual_screenshot_path}", name="操作结果",
                                  attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.TEXT)
                else:
                    allure.attach(f"未找到截图文件：{screenshot_name}.png", name="操作警告",
                                  attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.TEXT)

            with allure.step("点击日程创建按钮"):
                create_btn = self.page.get_element(home_user_schedule_create_btn_element, max_timeout=max_timeout)
                create_btn.click()
                print(f"点击创建btn成功")
                allure.attach(f"成功点击创建按钮，元素选择器：{home_user_schedule_create_btn_element}", name="操作结果",
                              attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.TEXT)

        except Exception as e:
            with allure.step("捕获异常：日程管理操作失败"):
                error_msg = f"日程管理失败：{str(e)}"
                self.logger.error(error_msg)
                allure.attach(error_msg, name="异常详情", attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.TEXT)

                # 异常时截图（同样只传纯文件名）
                timestamp = time.strftime("%H%M%S")
                error_screenshot_name = f"日程管理失败_{timestamp}"
                self.capture(error_screenshot_name)  # 核心：只传纯文件名
                time.sleep(1)

                # 查找失败截图的实际路径
                actual_error_screenshot_path = self._find_minium_screenshot(error_screenshot_name)
                if actual_error_screenshot_path:
                    allure.attach.file(actual_error_screenshot_path, name="失败截图",
                                       attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.PNG)
                else:
                    allure.attach(f"未找到失败截图：{error_screenshot_name}.png", name="异常补充",
                                  attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.TEXT)

                raise  # 重新抛出异常，不改变原有失败逻辑

        time.sleep(2)
